name: Dishes
title: Our Wonderful Dishes
alt: A vegan dish full of different types of vegtables
desc:
In our wonderful dishes, you'll find wholesome vegan meals made with affordable and protein-rich whole grains, beans, and nuts. 
 
 You'll also see plenty of fresh, colorful produce, and occasionally some tofu. No funny meat substitutes here.

products.name: Butternut Squash Mac & Cheese
products.desc:
Ultra creamy and delicious this Vegan Butternut Squash Mac & Cheese with smoky flavor is the BEST! With only 10 ingredients it's quick and  comfort food! 
 
 This is a delicious fall inspired mac and cheese made with butternut squash, cashews, nutritional yeast, smoked paprika and a few other everyday pantry staples.

products.name: The Ultimate Vegtable Vegan Lasagna
products.desc: The Ultimate Vegan Lasagna is loaded with veggies, vegan spinach-ricotta, and your favorite pasta sauce for a hearty, comforting, and absolutely amazing whole food, plant-based lasagna!

products.name: Chickpea Tikka Masala
products.desc: Dinner is on with this flavorful & saucy Indian-inspired vegan tikka masala recipe! It's lusciously creamy and easy to make right at home in one pan with simple ingredients!
products.alt: Chickpea Tikka Masala Dish with spoon

products.name: Grilled Kielbasa & Vegetable Kabobs
products.desc: Kebab, shish kabob, dinner on a stick, no matter what you like to call them, they are quick, easy and versatile!
products.alt: Grilled Veggies and Kielbasa Skewers Dish

products.name: Vegan Poke Bowl + Tofu Poke
products.desc: Vegan Poke Bowl (aka Tofu Poke Bowl) features tender tofu and onions marinated in a delicious ginger-soy sauce and paired with rice, red cabbage, cucumber, and avocado for a quick and easy meal bowl!

products.name: Thai Lettuce Wraps
products.desc: Easy Thai Lettuce Wraps with chickpea and quinoa â€˜meatballs' and peanut dressing are a perfect healthy and delicious vegan lunch or dinner made with everyday ingredients!
products.alt: Best thai lettuce wraps in a dish with lemon

name: Desserts
title: Our Delicious Desserts
alt: A vegan dessert dish with banana
desc:
In our delicious desserts, you'll find the  best vegan desserts, include plant-based twists on classic recipes with creative frozen treats, cakes, and more! 
 
 No matter what you're craving, you're guaranteed to find a sweet treat you love.

products.name: Chocolate Almond Butter Smoothie Bowl
products.desc: Chocolate Almond Butter Smoothie Bowl features decadent chocolate and nourishing almond butter blended with frozen bananas and chilled almond milk. A blissful treat any time of day!

products.name: Enlighten Smoothie Bowl
products.desc: Enlighten Smoothie Bowl is a thick and creamy smoothie in a bowl topped with a healthy and colorful mix of toppings for a delicious breakfast or treat!
products.alt: Smoothie Bowl with fruits on the top

products.name: Chocolate Vegan Buckwheat Waffles
products.desc: Healthy Buckwheat Waffles with chocolate and nut butter maple syrup is a pantry staple recipe made with minimal ingredients and easy to customize! It's a nutritious and delicious vegan and gluten-free dessert that is sure to be a favorite!
products.alt: Vegan Buckwheat Waffles Plate with fork

products.name: Mango Coconut Popsicles
products.desc: Mango Coconut Popsicles with granola are super easy to make and perfect for a quick breakfast or afternoon snack!

products.name: Healthy Banana Boats
products.desc: Looking for a quick and healthy, vegan snack the kids (and adults) will just LOVE, and love to make? This easy banana boats dessert is just what you need!

name: Drinks
title: Our Tasty Drinks
alt: A mug of vegan hot drink
desc:
If you think it's only the use of milk and milk products that come from animals that make a drink non-vegan, think again. 
 
 Whether you want something bright and fruity or crave creaminess sans the cream, our tasty vegan drinks will make your tastebuds sing.

products.name: Vegan Strawberry Milkshake
products.desc: Creamy Vegan Strawberry Milkshake is made with 5 simple ingredients and easy to make! Itâ€™s a healthy dessert that can double as a light breakfast shake or nourishing snack!
products.alt: Vegan Strawberry Milkshake glass with straw and toppings

products.name: Mexican Hot Chocolate
products.desc: Cozy up with a cup of vegan hot chocolate made with cocoa, cinnamon and chili spice! Itâ€™s easy to make on the stovetop or in the slow cooker and makes a delicious crowd-pleasing warm and festive winter drink!
products.alt: Mexican Hot Chocolate mug with cinnamon

products.name: Matcha Milkshake
products.desc: Vegan Matcha Milkshake made with matcha and a toasted coconut & cashew nut milk, is super easy and a delicious treat anytime of day!
products.alt: Matcha Milkshake glass with straw and toppings

products.name: Best Vegan Chocolate Milkshake
products.desc: Best Vegan Chocolate Milkshake can be made with banana or non-dairy ice cream for a thick, creamy, and decadent dessert thatâ€™s both healthy and delicious!
products.alt: Chocolate Milkshake Glass with straw and toppings

products.name: Blueberry Banana Smoothie
products.desc: A creamy blend of blueberries and banana with a dollop of protein-rich nut butter and a hint of cinnamon for a deliciously healthy vegan smoothie!
products.alt: Blueberry Banana Smoothie in a glass with straw and toppings

products.name: Banana Split Smoothie
products.desc: Banana Split Smoothie is a combo of fruits, cocoa powder, vanilla, and non-dairy milk for a delicious and healthy way to get in a serving of natural fruits!
products.alt: Banana Split Smoothie glass with a straw and toppings
